alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued August 24 at 5:09AM AKDT until August 26 at 6:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 6 PM AKDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Large breaking waves will wash surf to the top of the beach. * WHERE...North facing shores of St Lawrence Island and the Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 6 PM AKDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Localized beach erosion will occur. Items left on the beach might wash away. Debris will wash onto beaches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...North winds will increase today, with winds gusting 40 to 50 mph from this afternoon through Saturday. These winds will push waves high up the beach to near the vegetation line causing minor erosion and washing away items left on the beach. The worst conditions will be on north facing beaches.
info.instruction: Precautions should be taken to protect property.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
